amendment.description: To authorize a 2 year extension of the Parole Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 736 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 736 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S6352; text: CR S6352) To authorize a 2 year extension of the Parole Commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 736 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coburn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 736 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
